DDL.statement: INSERT INTO `SYS_MODULES` (`MODULE_ID`, `RF_ACTIVE`, `DK_ACTIVE`, `MODULE_TYPE`, `HINT`, `MNEMONIC`, `ICON_FILENAME`, `HELPSET_ID`, `REPORT_FILENAME`, `EXEC_FILENAME`, `EXEC_DIR`, `PRINT_PREVIEW`, `PRINT_DIALOG`, `PRINT_COPIES`, `REPORT_TYPE`, `RESOURCE_KEY`) VALUES ('FRM_ADMIN_PALLET_IMPORT', 'N', 'Y', 'FUNCTION', 'Import Pallet Data from XML', '0', '', '', '', '', '', 'N', 'N', '0', '', '')

INSERT INTO `SYS_MODULES` (`MODULE_ID`, `RF_ACTIVE`, `DK_ACTIVE`, `MODULE_TYPE`, `HINT`, `MNEMONIC`, `ICON_FILENAME`, `HELPSET_ID`, `REPORT_FILENAME`, `EXEC_FILENAME`, `EXEC_DIR`, `PRINT_PREVIEW`, `PRINT_DIALOG`, `PRINT_COPIES`, `REPORT_TYPE`, `RESOURCE_KEY`) VALUES ('FRM_ADMIN_PALLET_EXPORT', 'N', 'Y', 'FUNCTION', 'Export Pallet Data to XML', '0', '', '', '', '', '', 'N', 'N', '0', '', '')
INSERT INTO SYS_LANGUAGE(RESOURCE_KEY, LANGUAGE_ID, TEXT, MNEMONIC) VALUES ('btn_Import', 'EN', 'Import', '0')

INSERT INTO SYS_LANGUAGE(RESOURCE_KEY, LANGUAGE_ID, TEXT, MNEMONIC) VALUES ('btn_Import', 'PL', 'Import', '0')

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW `view_sync1` AS SELECT `app_label_data`.`PRINT_DATE` AS `PRINT_DATE`, `app_auto_labeller`.`UNIQUE_ID` AS `UNIQUE_ID`, `app_auto_labeller`.`LINE` AS `LINE`, `app_auto_labeller`.`GROUP_ID` AS `GROUP_ID`, `app_label_data`.`PROCESS_ORDER` AS `PROCESS_ORDER`, `app_process_order`.`STATUS` AS `STATUS`, `app_label_data`.`MATERIAL` AS `MATERIAL`, `app_label_data`.`MATERIAL_TYPE` AS `MATERIAL_TYPE`, `app_material`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `DESCRIPTION`, `app_material`.`OLD_MATERIAL` AS `OLD_MATERIAL`, `app_label_data`.`BATCH_NUMBER` AS `BATCH_NUMBER`, `app_label_data`.`BATCH_PREFIX` AS `BATCH_PREFIX`, `app_label_data`.`BATCH_SUFFIX` AS `BATCH_SUFFIX`, `app_label_data`.`REQUIRED_RESOURCE` AS `REQUIRED_RESOURCE`, `app_label_data`.`DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE` AS `DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE`, `app_label_data`.`EXPIRY_DATE` AS `EXPIRY_DATE`, `app_label_data`.`PROD_EAN` AS `PROD_EAN`, `app_label_data`.`PROD_VARIANT` AS `PROD_VARIANT`, `app_label_data`.`PROD_QUANTITY` AS `PROD_QUANTITY`, `app_label_data`.`PROD_UOM` AS `PROD_UOM`, `app_label_data`.`BASE_EAN` AS `BASE_EAN`, `app_label_data`.`BASE_VARIANT` AS `BASE_VARIANT`, `app_label_data`.`BASE_QUANTITY` AS `BASE_QUANTITY`, `app_label_data`.`BASE_UOM` AS `BASE_UOM`, `app_label_data`.`CUSTOMER_ID` AS `CUSTOMER_ID`, `app_customer`.`CUSTOMER_NAME` AS `CUSTOMER_NAME`, `app_label_data`.`LAYERS` AS `LAYERS`, `app_material`.`UPDATED` AS `MATERIAL_UPDATED`, `app_process_order`.`UPDATED` AS `PROCESS_ORDER_UPDATED`, `app_material`.`OVERRIDE_PACK_LABEL` AS `OVERRIDE_PACK_LABEL`, `app_material`.`PACK_LABEL_MODULE_ID` AS `PACK_LABEL_MODULE_ID`, `app_material`.`OVERRIDE_PALLET_LABEL` AS `OVERRIDE_PALLET_LABEL`, `app_material`.`PALLET_LABEL_MODULE_ID` AS `PALLET_LABEL_MODULE_ID` FROM ( ( ( ( `app_label_data` JOIN `app_auto_labeller` ON ( ( `app_label_data`.`UNIQUE_ID` = `app_auto_labeller`.`UNIQUE_ID` ) ) ) JOIN `app_customer` ON ( ( `app_customer`.`CUSTOMER_ID` = `app_label_data`.`CUSTOMER_ID` ) ) ) JOIN `app_material` ON ( ( `app_material`.`MATERIAL` = `app_label_data`.`MATERIAL` ) ) ) JOIN `app_process_order` ON ( ( `app_process_order`.`PROCESS_ORDER` = `app_label_data`.`PROCESS_ORDER` ) ) )

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW `view_sync2` AS SELECT `app_label_data`.`PRINT_DATE` AS `PRINT_DATE`, `app_auto_labeller`.`UNIQUE_ID` AS `UNIQUE_ID`, `app_auto_labeller`.`LINE` AS `LINE`, `app_auto_labeller`.`GROUP_ID` AS `GROUP_ID`, `app_label_data`.`PROCESS_ORDER` AS `PROCESS_ORDER`, `app_process_order`.`STATUS` AS `STATUS`, `app_label_data`.`MATERIAL` AS `MATERIAL`, `app_label_data`.`MATERIAL_TYPE` AS `MATERIAL_TYPE`, `app_material`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `DESCRIPTION`, `app_material`.`OLD_MATERIAL` AS `OLD_MATERIAL`, `app_label_data`.`BATCH_NUMBER` AS `BATCH_NUMBER`, `app_label_data`.`BATCH_PREFIX` AS `BATCH_PREFIX`, `app_label_data`.`BATCH_SUFFIX` AS `BATCH_SUFFIX`, `app_label_data`.`REQUIRED_RESOURCE` AS `REQUIRED_RESOURCE`, `app_label_data`.`DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE` AS `DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE`, `app_label_data`.`EXPIRY_DATE` AS `EXPIRY_DATE`, `app_label_data`.`PROD_EAN` AS `PROD_EAN`, `app_label_data`.`PROD_VARIANT` AS `PROD_VARIANT`, `app_label_data`.`PROD_QUANTITY` AS `PROD_QUANTITY`, `app_label_data`.`PROD_UOM` AS `PROD_UOM`, `app_label_data`.`BASE_EAN` AS `BASE_EAN`, `app_label_data`.`BASE_VARIANT` AS `BASE_VARIANT`, `app_label_data`.`BASE_QUANTITY` AS `BASE_QUANTITY`, `app_label_data`.`BASE_UOM` AS `BASE_UOM`, `app_label_data`.`CUSTOMER_ID` AS `CUSTOMER_ID`, `app_customer`.`CUSTOMER_NAME` AS `CUSTOMER_NAME`, `app_label_data`.`LAYERS` AS `LAYERS`, `app_material`.`UPDATED` AS `MATERIAL_UPDATED`, `app_process_order`.`UPDATED` AS `PROCESS_ORDER_UPDATED`, `app_material`.`OVERRIDE_PACK_LABEL` AS `OVERRIDE_PACK_LABEL`, `app_material`.`PACK_LABEL_MODULE_ID` AS `PACK_LABEL_MODULE_ID`, `app_material`.`OVERRIDE_PALLET_LABEL` AS `OVERRIDE_PALLET_LABEL`, `app_material`.`PALLET_LABEL_MODULE_ID` AS `PALLET_LABEL_MODULE_ID`, `sys_printers`.`PRINTER_ID` AS `PRINTER_ID`, `sys_printers`.`PRINTER_TYPE` AS `PRINTER_TYPE`, `sys_printers`.`IP_ADDRESS` AS `IP_ADDRESS`, `sys_printers`.`PORT` AS `PORT`, `sys_printers`.`ENABLED` AS `ENABLED`, `sys_printers`.`PRINTER_DPI` AS `PRINTER_DPI`, `sys_printers`.`PAPER_SIZE` AS `PAPER_SIZE` FROM ( ( ( ( ( ( `app_label_data` JOIN `app_auto_labeller` ON ( ( `app_label_data`.`UNIQUE_ID` = `app_auto_labeller`.`UNIQUE_ID` ) ) ) JOIN `app_customer` ON ( ( `app_customer`.`CUSTOMER_ID` = `app_label_data`.`CUSTOMER_ID` ) ) ) JOIN `app_material` ON ( ( `app_material`.`MATERIAL` = `app_label_data`.`MATERIAL` ) ) ) JOIN `app_process_order` ON ( ( `app_process_order`.`PROCESS_ORDER` = `app_label_data`.`PROCESS_ORDER` ) ) ) JOIN `sys_printer_line_membership` ON ( ( ( `app_auto_labeller`.`LINE` = `sys_printer_line_membership`.`LINE` ) AND ( `app_auto_labeller`.`GROUP_ID` = `sys_printer_line_membership`.`GROUP_ID` ) ) ) ) JOIN `sys_printers` ON ( ( ( `sys_printer_line_membership`.`GROUP_ID` = `sys_printers`.`GROUP_ID` ) AND ( `sys_printer_line_membership`.`PRINTER_ID` = `sys_printers`.`PRINTER_ID` ) ) ) )

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW `view_sync3a` AS SELECT `app_label_data`.`PROCESS_ORDER` AS `PROCESS_ORDER`, `app_label_data`.`MATERIAL` AS `MATERIAL`, `app_label_data`.`BATCH_NUMBER` AS `BATCH_NUMBER`, `app_label_data`.`LABEL_TYPE` AS `LABEL_TYPE`, `app_label_data`.`LINE` AS `LINE`, `app_label_data`.`PRINT_DATE` AS `PRINT_DATE` FROM `app_label_data`

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW `view_sync3b` AS SELECT `app_label_data`.`UNIQUE_ID` AS `UNIQUE_ID`, `app_label_data`.`LINE` AS `LINE`, `view_sync3a`.`LABEL_TYPE` AS `LABEL_TYPE`, `app_label_data`.`USER_ID` AS `USER_ID`, `app_label_data`.`WORKSTATION_ID` AS `WORKSTATION_ID`, `view_sync3a`.`PROCESS_ORDER` AS `PROCESS_ORDER`, `app_label_data`.`REQUIRED_RESOURCE` AS `REQUIRED_RESOURCE`, `view_sync3a`.`MATERIAL` AS `MATERIAL`, `app_label_data`.`MATERIAL_TYPE` AS `MATERIAL_TYPE`, `app_process_order`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `DESCRIPTION`, `view_sync3a`.`BATCH_NUMBER` AS `BATCH_NUMBER`, `app_label_data`.`BATCH_PREFIX` AS `BATCH_PREFIX`, `app_label_data`.`BATCH_SUFFIX` AS `BATCH_SUFFIX`, `app_process_order`.`STATUS` AS `STATUS`, `app_label_data`.`PRINT_DATE` AS `PRINT_DATE`, `app_label_data`.`PROD_EAN` AS `PROD_EAN`, `app_label_data`.`PROD_VARIANT` AS `PROD_VARIANT`, `app_label_data`.`PROD_QUANTITY` AS `PROD_QUANTITY`, `app_label_data`.`BASE_EAN` AS `BASE_EAN`, `app_label_data`.`BASE_VARIANT` AS `BASE_VARIANT`, `app_label_data`.`BASE_QUANTITY` AS `BASE_QUANTITY`, `app_label_data`.`DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE` AS `DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE`, `app_label_data`.`EXPIRY_DATE` AS `EXPIRY_DATE`, `app_material`.`UPDATED` AS `MATERIAL_UPDATED`, `app_process_order`.`UPDATED` AS `PROCESS_ORDER_UPDATED`, `app_process_order`.`CUSTOMER_ID` AS `CUSTOMER_ID`, `app_customer`.`CUSTOMER_NAME` AS `CUSTOMER_NAME`, `app_label_data`.`OVERRIDE_MANUFACTURE_DATE` AS `OVERRIDE_MANUFACTURE_DATE`, `app_label_data`.`OVERRIDE_EXPIRY_DATE` AS `OVERRIDE_EXPIRY_DATE`, `app_label_data`.`OVERRIDE_BATCH_PREFIX` AS `OVERRIDE_BATCH_PREFIX`, `app_material`.`OVERRIDE_PACK_LABEL` AS `OVERRIDE_PACK_LABEL`, `app_material`.`PACK_LABEL_MODULE_ID` AS `PACK_LABEL_MODULE_ID`, `app_material`.`OVERRIDE_PALLET_LABEL` AS `OVERRIDE_PALLET_LABEL`, `app_material`.`PALLET_LABEL_MODULE_ID` AS `PALLET_LABEL_MODULE_ID`, `app_label_data`.`LAYERS` AS `LAYERS` FROM ( ( ( ( `app_process_order` JOIN `view_sync3a` ON ( ( `app_process_order`.`PROCESS_ORDER` = `view_sync3a`.`PROCESS_ORDER` ) ) ) JOIN `app_label_data` ON ( ( ( `app_label_data`.`PRINT_DATE` = `view_sync3a`.`PRINT_DATE` ) AND ( `app_label_data`.`MATERIAL` = `view_sync3a`.`MATERIAL` ) AND ( `app_label_data`.`BATCH_NUMBER` = `view_sync3a`.`BATCH_NUMBER` ) AND ( `app_label_data`.`PROCESS_ORDER` = `view_sync3a`.`PROCESS_ORDER` ) AND ( `app_label_data`.`LABEL_TYPE` = `view_sync3a`.`LABEL_TYPE` ) AND ( `app_label_data`.`LINE` = `view_sync3a`.`LINE` ) ) ) ) JOIN `app_material` ON ( ( `app_material`.`MATERIAL` = `app_label_data`.`MATERIAL` ) ) ) JOIN `app_customer` ON ( ( `app_customer`.`CUSTOMER_ID` = `app_process_order`.`CUSTOMER_ID` ) ) ) WHERE ( ( `app_process_order`.`STATUS` = 'Ready' ) AND ( `app_label_data`.`LINE` > '' ) )

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW `view_sync4a` AS SELECT `app_label_data`.`PROCESS_ORDER` AS `PROCESS_ORDER`, `app_label_data`.`MATERIAL` AS `MATERIAL`, `app_label_data`.`BATCH_NUMBER` AS `BATCH_NUMBER`, `app_label_data`.`LABEL_TYPE` AS `LABEL_TYPE`, `app_label_data`.`LINE` AS `LINE`, `sys_printers`.`PRINTER_ID` AS `PRINTER_ID`, max( `app_label_data`.`PRINT_DATE` ) AS `LAST_PRINT_DATE` FROM ( ( `sys_printer_line_membership` JOIN `app_label_data` ON ( ( ( `sys_printer_line_membership`.`LINE` = `app_label_data`.`LINE` ) AND ( `sys_printer_line_membership`.`GROUP_ID` = `app_label_data`.`LABEL_TYPE` ) ) ) ) JOIN `sys_printers` ON ( ( `sys_printers`.`PRINTER_ID` = `sys_printer_line_membership`.`PRINTER_ID` ) ) ) GROUP BY `app_label_data`.`PROCESS_ORDER`, `app_label_data`.`MATERIAL`, `app_label_data`.`BATCH_NUMBER`, `app_label_data`.`LABEL_TYPE`, `app_label_data`.`LINE`, `sys_printers`.`PRINTER_ID`

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW `view_sync4b` AS SELECT `app_label_data`.`UNIQUE_ID` AS `UNIQUE_ID`, `app_label_data`.`LINE` AS `LINE`, `view_sync4a`.`LABEL_TYPE` AS `LABEL_TYPE`, `app_label_data`.`USER_ID` AS `USER_ID`, `app_label_data`.`WORKSTATION_ID` AS `WORKSTATION_ID`, `view_sync4a`.`PROCESS_ORDER` AS `PROCESS_ORDER`, `app_label_data`.`REQUIRED_RESOURCE` AS `REQUIRED_RESOURCE`, `view_sync4a`.`MATERIAL` AS `MATERIAL`, `app_label_data`.`MATERIAL_TYPE` AS `MATERIAL_TYPE`, `app_material`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `DESCRIPTION`, `view_sync4a`.`BATCH_NUMBER` AS `BATCH_NUMBER`, `app_label_data`.`BATCH_PREFIX` AS `BATCH_PREFIX`, `app_label_data`.`BATCH_SUFFIX` AS `BATCH_SUFFIX`, `app_process_order`.`STATUS` AS `STATUS`, `app_label_data`.`PRINT_DATE` AS `PRINT_DATE`, `app_label_data`.`PROD_EAN` AS `PROD_EAN`, `app_label_data`.`PROD_VARIANT` AS `PROD_VARIANT`, `app_label_data`.`PROD_QUANTITY` AS `PROD_QUANTITY`, `app_label_data`.`BASE_EAN` AS `BASE_EAN`, `app_label_data`.`BASE_VARIANT` AS `BASE_VARIANT`, `app_label_data`.`BASE_QUANTITY` AS `BASE_QUANTITY`, `app_label_data`.`DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE` AS `DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE`, `app_label_data`.`EXPIRY_DATE` AS `EXPIRY_DATE`, `app_material`.`UPDATED` AS `MATERIAL_UPDATED`, `app_process_order`.`UPDATED` AS `PROCESS_ORDER_UPDATED`, `app_customer`.`CUSTOMER_ID` AS `CUSTOMER_ID`, `app_customer`.`CUSTOMER_NAME` AS `CUSTOMER_NAME`, `app_label_data`.`OVERRIDE_MANUFACTURE_DATE` AS `OVERRIDE_MANUFACTURE_DATE`, `app_label_data`.`OVERRIDE_EXPIRY_DATE` AS `OVERRIDE_EXPIRY_DATE`, `app_label_data`.`OVERRIDE_BATCH_PREFIX` AS `OVERRIDE_BATCH_PREFIX`, `app_material`.`OVERRIDE_PACK_LABEL` AS `OVERRIDE_PACK_LABEL`, `app_material`.`PACK_LABEL_MODULE_ID` AS `PACK_LABEL_MODULE_ID`, `app_material`.`OVERRIDE_PALLET_LABEL` AS `OVERRIDE_PALLET_LABEL`, `app_material`.`PALLET_LABEL_MODULE_ID` AS `PALLET_LABEL_MODULE_ID`, `app_label_data`.`LAYERS` AS `LAYERS`, `view_sync4a`.`PRINTER_ID` AS `PRINTER_ID`, `sys_printers`.`PRINTER_ID` AS `PRINTER_ID_0`, `sys_printers`.`PRINTER_TYPE` AS `PRINTER_TYPE`, `sys_printers`.`IP_ADDRESS` AS `IP_ADDRESS`, `sys_printers`.`PORT` AS `PORT`, `sys_printers`.`ENABLED` AS `ENABLED`, `sys_printers`.`PRINTER_DPI` AS `PRINTER_DPI`, `sys_printers`.`PAPER_SIZE` AS `PAPER_SIZE` FROM ( ( ( ( ( `app_label_data` JOIN `view_sync4a` ON ( ( ( `app_label_data`.`PROCESS_ORDER` = `view_sync4a`.`PROCESS_ORDER` ) AND ( `app_label_data`.`MATERIAL` = `view_sync4a`.`MATERIAL` ) AND ( `app_label_data`.`BATCH_NUMBER` = `view_sync4a`.`BATCH_NUMBER` ) AND ( `app_label_data`.`LABEL_TYPE` = `view_sync4a`.`LABEL_TYPE` ) AND ( `app_label_data`.`LINE` = `view_sync4a`.`LINE` ) ) ) ) JOIN `app_process_order` ON ( ( `app_process_order`.`PROCESS_ORDER` = `view_sync4a`.`PROCESS_ORDER` ) ) ) JOIN `app_customer` ON ( ( `app_customer`.`CUSTOMER_ID` = `app_process_order`.`CUSTOMER_ID` ) ) ) JOIN `app_material` ON ( ( `app_material`.`MATERIAL` = `view_sync4a`.`MATERIAL` ) ) ) JOIN `sys_printers` ON ( ( `sys_printers`.`PRINTER_ID` = `view_sync4a`.`PRINTER_ID` ) ) ) WHERE ( ( `app_process_order`.`STATUS` = 'Ready' ) AND ( `app_label_data`.`LINE` > '' ) )
